column4: hey guys, ive downloaded an iso file. i was hoping i could mount the iso and it would run automatically, as if it were a physical cd
the thing is, the launch program is an exe, and if i mount the iso, and try to run it in wine, it eventually crashes. is there anyway i can make it run without needing wine?
i tend to copy all teh binaries from a a cd to  (for example )  the .wine/drive_C/GameInstall dir.   then  run the installer from there.
some games are ok with it. some are not.
it whould work then i imagine
